name: DiveBomb
description:
Dive Bomb is a project that was made by 5 video game students during Juicy Jam #1.

Best Played with a controller !

Controls :

Left stick / WASD to move

RT / Shift to Dive

LT / Spacebar to Brake

A / E to start/restart

Select / Escape to quit

The goal is to get as much money as you can during a free fall. How, I hear you ask ? Well, by blowing up pretty much anything you encounter, of course ! You can also throw dynamites coming near you to other things to make them blow up as well. Or if you prefer a more frontal approach, you can straight up crash through any props you encounter !

If you get enough scraps, maybe lady luck will give you an item to help you blowing up more stuff !

Credits to Redjack for the music =>
